BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.postgresql.authentication.authenticator.impl.PostgreSQLMD5PasswordAuthenticator.authenticate(ShardingSphereUser, Object[]) accesses list or array with constant index

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.postgresql.authentication.authenticator.impl.PostgreSQLMD5PasswordAuthenticator.md5Encode(String, String, byte[]) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding
Unsafe comparison of hash that are susceptible to timing attack
This API MD5 (MDX) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function
This API MD5 (MDX) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function

new org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.postgresql.command.query.extended.Portal(String, PostgreSQLServerPreparedStatement, List, List, BackendConnection): 2nd parameter 'preparedStatement' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.session.ServerPreparedStatement instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.postgresql.command.query.extended.PostgreSQLAggregatedBatchedStatementsCommandExecutor.execute() uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.postgresql.command.query.extended.describe.PostgreSQLComDescribeExecutor.describeReturning(ReturningSegment, Map, Map) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.postgresql.command.query.extended.describe.PostgreSQLComDescribeExecutor.tryDescribePreparedStatementByJDBC(PostgreSQLServerPreparedStatement) uses iterator().next() on a List to get the first item
This use of java/sql/Connection.prepareStatement(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/PreparedStatement; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.postgresql.command.query.simple.PostgreSQLComQueryExecutor.createUpdatePacket(UpdateResponseHeader) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
